name: Misdreavus
flavorText:
It likes playing
mischievous tricks
such as screaming and wailing to
startle people at
night.

previous.name: Slowking
previous.flavorText:
It has incredible
intellect and in­
tuition. Whatever the situation, it
remains calm and
collected.

next.name: Unown
next.flavorText:
Their shapes look
like hieroglyphs
on ancient tab­ lets. It is said
that the two are
somehow related.
next.formDescription: Forms only affect appearance.  A form is determined at random before a wild encounter and cannot be changed.

pokemon.name: Misdreavus
pokemon.flavorText:
It likes playing
mischievous tricks
such as screaming and wailing to
startle people at
night.

pokemon.name: Mismagius
pokemon.flavorText:
Its cries sound like incantations.
Those hearing it are tormented
by headaches and hallucinations.
